title: Constructivist-Based Electronic Textile Debugging Design Project

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic electronic circuits and programming concepts, experience with text-based coding
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning utilizing math-based problem-solving strategies in BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environments.

learning_goals: Learners can identify, classify, and explain three or more types of system errors that occurred in the electronic textile project
Learners can design a three-step diagnostic process applying mathematical logic verification to solve peers’ debugging issues
Learners can intentionally design electronic textile prototypes with inherent error possibilities and share them on the LMS
Learners can explain the interaction relationships between circuits-code-physical structures through mathematical modeling while analyzing peers’ error cases
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
